title: Global Day Coderetreat 2022 - Codurance, Madrid, Spain
description: Coderetreat has an established, time-tested format that is optimised for focused practice. We will be working on implementing Conway's Game of Life in 45-minute sessions. In each one, you'll pair program in whichever language you like, using whichever technologies you and your partner prefer. The day will begin at 9:00 a.m. in our Monday Chamber√≠ co-working space and end at 16:00 p.m. Lunch will be provided. It's an early start, so sleep well the night before to help get those brain juices flowing. Remember to bring your laptop and be ready to have fun! :)
